Spot-Numbers Rules


Spot-Numbers is a game for two players. In this game, they are named Alice and Bob.

Each person looks for the numbers and clicks on them as fast as possible. The number must be clicked in correct order (i.e 1,2,3...)

The winer is the player who clicks on more numbers.

Hint:
- This game is best when playing on large screen device (like Playbook tablet)
- Be careful ! Number "6" and number "9" are very similar. - If you need more challenge, you can play with the advanced mode.

Spot-Numbers


Being on a train and you need a game to play with your friend. Or you have two kids but only one tablet. Or you want to help your kids to read the numbers faster
This simple game is suitable for you.

Spot-Numbers is a cooperative-game for two players.

The rule is pretty simple. Each person tries to look for the numbers and then click on them as fast as possible.
In order to get score, player must click on the number in the correct order (i.e 1,2,3...).
Once a number is "spotted" by one player, it cannot be spotted by the other.

The winer is the player who clicks on more numbers.

The game is pretty simple, but it is the competition of players that make it attrative.


Hint:
- Look ahead and remember the location of number in advance is a good strategy.
- Be careful ! Number 6 and number 9 are very similar. It\'s the risk piece of this game.
- This game is supposed for two player. Playing it alone is sure boring.
- This game is best when playing on large screen device (like Playbook tablet)
- If you need more challenge, you can play with the advanced mode.
